page.title: 13LANGUAGE
page.content: Living in our area are people from many varied ethnic origins besides the indigenous population. The majority of famillies (83%) speak English all the time, as do the children at school. 17% of famillies, however, use other languages. Of these 4% speak no English at all in the home, 12% speak a mixture of English and one other language, 1% use English together with 2 other languages. The ethnic languages include Punjabi,Gujerati,Israeli,Spanish,Itali an,Urdu,Hindi,Polish and Greek. Some Indian famillies speak several languages due to having lived in different regions of India before coming here to live. Classes in ethnic languages are held on Sundays (Indian) orevenings (Italian and Spanish). Many children have older brothers/sisters who are learning another language.
